item.title: Introduction
item.content:encoded:
This first "article" is going to be a little introduction to the blog.

First of all, welcome everyone that made it this far and were enticed to click on this quite odd website.

About the content

The content of this blog will only be short stories. Rather popular content you might be saying in front of your screen, but no no no my friend, there's a catch. There will be a main theme, a compelling story, joyfull and sometimes joyless character (the not-so original formula), BUT there will be a lot of hasardeous turn of event as most of the situations our character will end up in will be resolved using dice roll.

Here's a little example : As our fellow group of adventurer pushed the door of the tavern, all the faces were looking at them, and something fishy was going on. A strange man came to them and asked a simple question:

And one dice roll would happen here, in all honestly I would write the number given by the simple, yes quite beautiful die 20. For the sake of demonstration, let's say I rolled a good old 1. Now the outcome of this unfortunate 1.

- We were all wondering how your young blood tasted.

This would turn the simple act of entering in a tavern into a desastrous face-to-face with vampires. On the opposite side, everything would have been different if I would have rolled a 5, a 13 or even a 17. There will be a lot of possible outcome to each situation but you, the reader, will only see one each time.

I'll try my best to upload content at least once a week on saturday, but keep an eye on the site or the rss feed (dicedrivenstories.com/rss.xml) as there might be some surprises during the week.

I hope you'll have a really good time reading my short stories, and don't be afraid to send me some kind words at hainezob@gmail.com.
